Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Unsere Idee & Mission: Wir bringen Dich aufs Wasser! Ein Boot ermöglicht es dir neue Orte zu entdecken und einzigartige Erlebnis mit deiner Familie und Freunden zu erleben. Willkommen bei unserer fortschrittlichen Bootsfahrschule, wo wir einen unvergleichlichen Spitzen Service und Support bieten. Unsere tiefverwurzelte Idee und Mission ist es, Dich auf das faszinierende Element Wasser zu bringen! Wir glauben fest daran, dass ein Boot Dir die Möglichkeit gibt, neue Horizonte zu entdecken und einzigartige Abenteuer mit Deiner Familie und Deinen Freunden zu erleben. Das Gefühl der Freiheit, das man auf dem Wasser empfindet, ist unvergleichlich und wir möchten dieses Erlebnis mit Dir teilen. Unser preiswerter Onlinekurs ermöglicht es Dir, Dich überall und zu jeder Zeit auf Deine SBF-Prüfung vorzubereiten. Die Flexibilität unserer Kurszeiten passt sich Deinem geschäftigen Lebensstil an, sodass Du Deinen Traum vom Bootfahren verwirklichen kannst, ohne Abstriche machen zu müssen. Unser junges und hochmotiviertes Team ist stets bereit, Dir bei Fragen und Anliegen kompetente Unterstützung zu bieten. Wir stehen Dir zur Seite, während Du die Grundlagen des Bootsfahrens erlernst und Dich auf die Herausforderungen vorbereitest. Wir sind mehr als nur eine Bootsfahrschule – wir sind Wegbereiter für Deine aufregende Reise auf dem Wasser. Lass uns gemeinsam die Welt des Bootfahrens entdecken und unvergessliche Erinnerungen erschaffen, die ein Leben lang halten werden. Willkommen an Bord!
Industry Groups: Education, Software, Sports

Description: Manure without Methane
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Our proprietary technology stops methane and all other climate gases and ammonia from the storage of manure and digestate, and it reduces climate gases from their application to fields. One of these resources is a fuel based on ammonia, which is used directly as a carbon-free fuel or which serves as a hydrogen source. Agrogreen’s technology for processing manure and digestate is based on a pressureless osmosis that does not clog and only requires little energy. We have filed four patent applications.

The company was founded as a university spin-out by 2 serial entrepreneurs and an experienced DAC researcher.

Description: High-Quality Biochar Carbon Dioxide Removal in the Global South
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: PyroCCS is a German ClimateTech Startup focusing on Carbon Dioxide Removal from Biochar. PyroCCS exclusively works in countries of the Global South and currently has operational projects in India and Namibia. We generate highest quality Carbon Credits with our own proprietary pyrolysis technology that we have developed over the last 2 years. Our machinery is simple, low-cost, robust, easy to fix and can be set up decentralised in rural areas by deploying solar power. In comparison to high-tech plants from Europe, we are able to set up a new project from scratch (from signing the first contracts to generating the first carbon credits) within 5 to 6 months as we are also having full control over machine manufacturing via one of our Joint Ventures. Together with our world-class dMRV system "PyroCCS Sarva Carbon" we enable a new level of traceability and transparency regarding carbon removal. Next to developing own projects we provide our solutions to third parties as a Plug&Play system (machinery plus dMRV plus Carbon Standard Certification). Currently we work with the EBC C-Sink Standard and Puro but our projects are also able to get certified according to Verra or Gold Standard. By 2028 we intend to operate more than 500 plants across the Global South.
Industry Groups: Information Technology, Manufacturing, Professional Services, Science and Engineering, Software, Sustainability
Founders: Carlos Arrufat Y Grümer, Flo Oberhofer, Timo Herbrand

Full Description: Cybervize is an innovative player in the cybersecurity landscape, specializing in autonomous cyber risk management and cybersecurity solutions. It focuses on providing comprehensive cybersecurity risk assessments and implementing Information Security Management Systems (ISMS) tailored to the unique needs of each client. Distinguished by its use of both open-source and commercial products, Cybervize empowers companies to independently manage and enhance their cybersecurity posture.   At the core of Cybervize's offering is a state-of-the-art Software as a Service (SaaS) platform. This platform enables clients to take charge of their cybersecurity strategies without the reliance on traditional consulting services. By emphasizing best practice measures specifically designed to protect critical business processes, Cybervize positions itself as a crucial ally for companies navigating the complexities of digital threats and compliance in today's fast-paced, technology-driven world.   Cybervize's approach is unique in that it blends the technical sophistication of cybersecurity solutions with a user-centric model, allowing businesses to understand, implement, and maintain effective cybersecurity measures autonomously. This positions Cybervize not just as a service provider, but as a partner in fostering a resilient and secure digital environment for its clients.
Industry Groups: Information Technology, Privacy and Security, Software

Industries: B2B, Digital Media, E-Commerce, Enterprise Applications, Enterprise Software, Graphic Design, Information Technology, Marketing, Marketing Automation, SaaS
Description: SaaS, Web App, Mobile App, Content Marketing, Graphic Design,
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Bluepic is reinventing how brands’ create their digital media content! We believe in the power of strictly separating the process of designing from coming up with content. That's why we've developed a next generation software suite catered to diverse digital marketing needs. The rise of online marketing channels as vital means of customer engagement has increased the demand for visually appealing content from businesses. This, combined with the consumers expectation of personalized experiences, has led to a surge in the need for professional digital media creation across various platforms and channels. With decentralized organizational structures and the rise of remote work the need to involve more and more people in the digital media creation process, companies require streamlined workflows and collaborative tools. Bluepic tackles this demand by offering an innovative workflow that strictly separates the process of designing from coming up with content. Introducing Bluepic Studio, the industry's first comprehensive no-code editor for crafting responsive graphic templates. A professional designer can create templates tailored precisely to the company's brand identity, that later can be easily customized by non-professional users to create the final content. As designers work on the templates, they can leverage an extensive library of input modules, mathematical functions, and logical operations. Imagine Bluepic Studio as a fusion of a graphic design tool and spreadsheet software, with never-before-seen template creation features. These Bluepic templates can be effortlessly shared with all your employees, business partners, or even third parties via the Bluepic Social app. With Bluepic Social graphics become forms! Anyone is now able to fill templates with content from anywhere and on any device, within a minute. The best part? There is no need of design skills or knowledge of the brand-design-guidelines because the design happens automatically and safely in the background.
Industry Groups: Apps, Commerce and Shopping, Design, Information Technology, Media and Entertainment, Other, Sales and Marketing, Software

Industries: Blockchain, Information Services, Information Technology, Non-Fungible Token (NFT), Web3
Description: Logion is a pioneering blockchain that transforms Digital Assets into legal-grade evidence through its unique "Proof of Law" concept.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Logion represents a groundbreaking advancement in blockchain technology and legal compliance, setting a new standard in the digital economy for the perception and utilization of digital assets. Central to Logion's mission is the empowerment of tokens across various blockchains, elevating them to legal-grade digital assets with real-world relevance. In the rapidly evolving digital landscape, a significant gap exists between the on-chain representation of assets (tokens on the blockchain) and their real-world rights and values. Logion addresses this challenge by synergizing advanced blockchain technology with a comprehensive legal framework. This innovative approach ensures that tokens extend beyond mere digital representations, embodying verifiable rights, obligations, and tangible value. At the heart of Logion's infrastructure is the "Proof of Law" concept, a unique and pivotal feature that assures the legal enforceability and legitimacy of every token and digital asset on the platform. It signifies a token's tangible value and the rights attached to it, effectively bridging the gap between digital and physical realms. Beyond token-based operations, Logion's versatility shines in its application to non-token processes, particularly in enhancing the security and efficiency of supply chains. By implementing Zero Knowledge Proof (ZKP) technology, Logion certifies data without compromising privacy, under the oversight of a decentralized network of Judicial Officers. This approach guarantees not only technical safety but legal protection, fostering a digital economy that is transparent, trustworthy, and accessible to a broader audience. Logion is more than a blockchain platform; it's a visionary initiative to transform how digital assets are viewed and utilized, bringing unparalleled transparency and legal integrity to the forefront of the digital age.
Industry Groups: Blockchain and Cryptocurrency, Information Technology, Internet Services, Other
Top 5 Investors: Outlier Ventures, Primal Capital, WING by Digital Wallonia

Description: Vertical SaaS, Mobile App
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: The big problem in nursing care for the elderly is the huge shortage and overload of staff. Communication is too slow for the high dynamics. The exchange with relatives/clients and partners has similar problems. WhatsApp is often used but not GDPR compliant. There is no communication solution that focuses on the industry and integrates the key stakeholders of the ecosystem. By 2030 there will be a shortage of 500,000 caregivers in Germany alone. Thus, the search for the most efficient way of interaction is not a question of profit maximization, but a fundamental necessity for ensuring basic care in our society. Welcome to LUCI - the one-stop-hub for healthcare facilities. LUCI digitizes, automates and centralizes exchanges and processes between healthcare companies, employees, relatives, clients and partners. The LUCI app is used by nursing homes and other social institutions to communicate and collaborate more easily, quickly and cheaply. It reduces workload, saves time, and makes operations more efficient and resilient. It creates greater engagement and higher productivity. LUCI is unique in two ways. First, LUCI is from care for care. Second, LUCI will soon serve as a single point of contact for the key stakeholders of healthcare organizations.
Industry Groups: Health Care, Software

Description: Enoti ist eine innovative Kundenbindingssoftware für kleine regionale Geschäfte.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Enoti ist eine wegweisende Kundenbindingssoftware, die gezielt für kleine regionale Geschäfte konzipiert wurde. Die Software bietet eine zeitgemäße Enterprise-Lösung, mit der kleine regionale Geschäfte ihre Kundenbindung und Umsatzmöglichkeiten durch ein innovatives digitales Treueprogramm optimieren können, um sich somit erfolgreich von der Konkurrenz abzuheben. Die herausragenden Funktionen von Enoti umfassen die Bereitstellung digitaler Kundenkarten für mobile Wallets, Wallet Push Marketing und Gamification. Durch die Implementierung dieser Features können Geschäfte eine digitale Kundendatenbank aufbauen, mit der sie ihre Kunden jederzeit online erreichen können. Darüber hinaus eröffnet sich die Möglichkeit, den Kunden das Sammeln von Punkten gegen attraktive Prämien anzubieten und dabei spielerische Elemente einzusetzen, um die Kundenbindung zu fördern. Enoti positioniert sich somit als unverzichtbare Lösung für kleine regionale Geschäfte, die ihre Wettbewerbsfähigkeit durch innovative Technologien und fortschrittliche Kundenbindungsmethoden entscheidend stärken möchten.
Industry Groups: Software

Industries: Consumer, Consumer Goods, Delivery, E-Commerce, Food and Beverage, Food Delivery, Grocery, Retail, Retail Technology, Same Day Delivery
Description: New generation express delivery grocery retailer in Germany: delivery time starting from 10 minutes
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: GetFaster.IO changes the way people buy groceries. With delivery time starting from 10 minutes, target assortment of 2500 SKUs and prices in line with the next chain store, GetFaster is disrupting food retail market to become one of biggest German grocery retailers. GetFaster launched its operations in Düsseldorf in October 2021 to provide German households with fast, convenient, and safe way to buy groceries. With delivery time starting from 10 minutes, prices in line with the closest chain store, and assortment of 1500+ SKUs (to be increased to 2500+), GetFaster is challenging classic grocery retail market. GetFaster big goal is to become one of leading German grocery retailers, offering its services to at least 15 mln German households. Disruption is based on the business model of superfast delivery from the closest Micro Fulfillment Center (MFC), or “darkstore”, as some call them. This model has already proved its efficiency in different countries, from UK and USA to Russia and Turkey. GetFaster GmBH has raised pre-seed round of €1,2mln from several international private investors in January 2021. The business demonstrates steady weekly growth at rate of 25%+ and impressive €45 average check. Currently operating from its first MFC in Düsseldorf, GetFaster plans to open 3-4 new darkstores and start delivery in Essen until June. GetFaster plans to raise more capital on seed round in May-June to maintain aggressive growth and cover at least German cities in 2021.  Founders of GetFaster have their roots in ecommerce, grocery retail, logistic, and IT.
Industry Groups: Administrative Services, Commerce and Shopping, Consumer Goods, Food and Beverage, Hardware, Other, Software, Transportation
Founders: Anton Zakharov, Dmitry Bergelson, George Skalsky, Kirill Solonitsyn
Top 5 Investors: AltaIR Capital, Raison Wealth, Angelsdeck Global Ventures, Startup Lab, Fores Ventures

Description: 3D printing,  additive manufacturing, artificial intelligence
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: iFactory3D GmbH was founded in October 2020 with the mission to bring affordable continuous belt 3D-printer to the mass market enabling its users to expand their creativity regardless of the size of the printer’s bed. The basis of the 3D-printer is an innovative belt technology, which broadens the horizons of user’s creative work via full automation and a continuous printing process.  In a few months, iFactory3D successfully secured partnerships with key business stakeholders: the team of high qualified engineers working on improvements of the printer and key suppliers. Additionally, the Company applied for several accelerator programs and received positive feedback from promising investors. Moreover, the Company contacted more than 1000 3D-printing enthusiasts and got positive feedback about the price and quality of the printer. The focus lies on the B2C segment, which suffers from the absence of ready-to-buy solutions of such a type of a belt printer. As for today only a few prototypes were created and a few quite expensive B2B solutions are available on the market. The company with its headquarter in Germany has access to one of the largest and one of the most payable B2C markets. The Company identifies two main customers groups: “creative makers” - hobbyists who enjoy experimenting with new ideas on their 3D printer at home, that despite the desktop size allows beyond-edge printing, fitting infinite row of interests: handcrafting, gaming, collections, etc.; “effective SMEs” - SMEs and entrepreneurs who already have or do explore the benefits of 3D printing to improve their main business activities: speeding up prototyping process, creating unique competitive spare parts, decreasing the dependance on oversee suppliers, etc.-all of this with one belt printer that can replace a few regular ones.
Industry Groups: Consumer Electronics, Hardware, Information Technology, Manufacturing, Software

Full Description: MANSIO's unique IT solution enables cross-company relay transportation. Thereby, the semi-trailer is handed over from one truck to another at a parking lot along the route. After this “trailer swap”, the truckers drive back to their particular home regions with their own semi-truck and the swapped trailer from the opposite direction. In the MANSIO transportation system, empty runs to find return loads and parking-search-traffic are eliminated. Semi-trucks can be used very cost-efficiently in a second shift and - by that - generate additional revenue. In the future, the MANSIO trailer handover system will also allow battery-electric trucks with short ranges to be used on certain sections of long distance transport routes.

Description: We launched the LKW.APP to empower truck drivers in their everyday life by leveraging an innovative app.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: There is currently a shortage of over 70,000 truck drivers in Germany. If too many drivers are missing, supply chains cannot be maintained, and the supply chain is interrupted. One of the causes of the driver shortage is poor working conditions. For this reason, we have launched the LKW.APP with aparkado to provide truck drivers with better working conditions by simplifying their daily routine with the help of an innovative app. The LKW.APP includes an intelligent parking guidance system with over 20,000 listed parking spaces including on-site services. A unique feature is the parking space utilization display. The loading ramp guide provides valuable information about the loading ramps of the companies. With the LKW.APP, we want to ensure safe transportation, where drivers can spend relaxing breaks along the highway. The app's features are designed to display helpful information that they can use to optimize their workday. Not only is this convenient, but it also increases safety on the roads, as the app can warn drivers of dangerous conditions and keep them updated on any traffic-related issues. In addition, the trucker app also helps improve working conditions by highlighting grievances and encouraging improvements. Nothing works without truck drivers. We are convinced of this and are committed to improving the professional lives of the drivers.
Industry Groups: Software, Transportation

Description: RF Shielding textiles
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Thin, cheap, and tailor-made shielding textile against radio waves Genax is the owner of a European patent for a single layer fabric able to shield the human body against electromagnetic waves. The textile is created in such a way that the single layer can present different yarns in the sides of the single-layer fabric.  This allows the creation of a thin, single layer shielding fabric that can be put in direct contact with the skin (for instance using a cotton side and a technical side).  The world’s softest and more versatile shielding textile.  Because of its unique way of production, Genax is:  −	Thin (does not interfere with the style/functionality of existing garments) o	It can be easily implemented in existing clothing.  −	Tuneable (Its versatile production allows the realization of textile with high/low shielding properties, as well as thicknesses that range from “as thin as women’s tights/stockings” or “as thick as a sweater”)  −	Single-layer (Does not require the creation of a “sandwich-like” textile, as it currently happens in the market)  −	Double-sided (One side is conductive and the other can be realized with more comfortable fibers like cotton, wool, synthetic, or others).
Industry Groups: Manufacturing

Description: anny streamlines bookings for rooms, desks and any other resource, both internal and external.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: anny is a dynamic company at the forefront of resource sharing and booking management technology. Our mission is to revolutionize how businesses and enterprises manage their resources, offering a seamless and comprehensive platform for organizing and handling various types of bookings. From office spaces and meeting rooms to equipment, services, courses, and events, anny's platform caters to all your organizational needs. What distinguishes anny is its blend of user-friendly design and robust enterprise features. Our platform enables the creation of dedicated booking pages for both internal and external users, simplifying the process of listing and managing resources. This ease of use extends to all aspects of our service, whether it's for internal desk reservations or external event scheduling. Key features of anny include our Weekplanner, which facilitates simple, one-click bookings for desks and home offices, and is accessible via web and mobile platforms. We also offer an interactive booking map for a digital walkthrough of office spaces, enhancing resource location and booking efficiency. In addition, anny fosters community building within organizations by grouping people with specific permissions and offering special booking rates. Our mobile app, available for iOS and Android, streamlines the booking process, supporting QR code tickets and native wallets for easy check-ins. The platform also automates invoicing and payments, with flexible pay-later options. With anny, businesses gain access to live dashboards for real-time insights and analytics, aiding in efficient management of bookings and operations. Our Rooms display app allows for real-time room occupancy display and ad-hoc bookings. The platform also features smart availability settings, customizable plans and memberships, coupon codes, and a wide range of configuration options. Integration with popular tools and systems is effortless with anny. We support synchronization with calendar tools like MS365/Outlook and Google Calendars, integration with smart locks, and booking through the MS Outlook anny add-in. Ideal for companies in hybrid environments, co-working spaces, conference centers, and educational institutions, anny offers flexible pricing plans tailored to different needs. Based in Cologne, Germany, our team is committed to providing exceptional support and continuous innovation.
Industry Groups: Administrative Services, Events, Information Technology, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment, Real Estate, Software

Description: Die Deutsche Teilkauf GmbH ist ein Scale up im Bereich Equity Release. Das Unternehmen versteht sich als Hybrid aus PropTech und FinTech.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Deutsche Teilkauf GmbH is a scale-up in the field of equity release for real estate owners aged 55 and older. The company sees itself as a hybrid of PropTech and FinTech. Deutsche Teilkauf's customers are seen as partners - the focus is always on the trusting co-owner relationship, which is supported by honest and transparent advice. The TÜV & Dekra certified company was awarded the "REAL PropTech Germany Award" in the category "Financing, Valuing & Investing" in April 2022. We enable property owners to convert part of their real estate assets into cash in order to enjoy financial freedom, especially in retirement. In doing so, owners can continue to live in their homes and benefit from the property as a financial investment that retains its value. The company guarantees its customers a lifelong usufructuary right, which is registered with first priority on the entire property in the land register. In return, the partial seller pays a monthly usage fee. Both partners benefit from the future increase in the value of the property. The team has grown steadily and today comprises over 80 experts with a wealth of experience in real estate (Engel & Voelkers ), financing (Deutsche Bank, LEG), technology (Deutsche Telekom) and marketing (WPP). Today, the company is led by Marian Kirchhoff.
Industry Groups: Financial Services, Real Estate
Founders: André Dölker, Marian Kirchhoff, Sabine Nass

Description: Simplify the complexity of precision farming using multi-year field variability and accurate variable rate application maps.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: GeoPard Agriculture is an agriculture intelligence platform that enables crop farming agribusinesses to increase ROI and to integrate data-driven sustainable precision Ag practices using cutting-edge spatial data analytics and AI algorithms. In particular, GeoPard automates workflows to create VRA maps for seeding, fertilizing, and crop protection based on various data sources and custom agronomic logic. GeoPard provides its solution as White-label, On-premise, API, web, and mobile applications. GeoPard offers the following modules: - Geospatial business intelligence for farm data: high-density sensors, vegetation indexes, yield, soil chemical profile, lidar topography; processing pipelines, field productivity reports, automated scalable analytics capabilities at field/farm/region levels -3D maps of a field - Multi-data layers and cross-data layers field analytics to research factors that limit field productivity or to detect anomalies - Variable Rate Application maps for seeding, fertilizing, spraying, soil sampling and planning for scouting - Mobile application with off-line geospatial data capabilities to have access to necessary maps and data layers even without a stable internet connection - Digital transformation assistance to utilize geospatial big data potential - Tailored cloud scalable solutions based on GeoPard API - GeoPard acts as a technology and digital transformation partner for agribusinesses
Industry Groups: Agriculture and Farming, Data and Analytics
Founders: Dmitry Dementiev, Dzmitry Yablonski, Vladimir Klinkov

Description: eevie is a engagement tool to measure & reward employee climate action and to foster a climate friendly work culture.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: The age of decarbonization has finally begun, however, as emphasized by the latest IPCC report, we are still moving extremely slowly towards a net-zero future. The problem is that companies now stand under immense pressure to accelerate their decarbonization efforts: - The best talent wants to work for companies that will positively shape our future. - Shareholders are demanding companies execute on climate-friendly strategy - Financing conditions are increasingly made dependent on companies ESG ratings - A high price on carbon emissions seems inevitable - and most importantly we are running out of time! At eevie we, therefore, want to accelerate climate action by helping our leading enterprise corporations create and foster a climate-friendly work culture. Only if our leading corporations embrace a climate-friendly work culture and strong signals to their employees that climate is an essential part of their work, only then will they be able to attract the best talent and transform their business from within in order to reach their net-zero emissions goals quickly.
Industry Groups: Apps, Mobile, Other, Social Impact, Software, Sustainability

This is what enabled us to revolutionize the tattoo industry in Europe, shifting consumer loyalty from individual artists to a trusted brand where customers can confidently rely on the expertise of any of our artists. Unlike typical tattoo and piercing studios, our digitalized customer experience ensures a seamless journey from initial contact to aftercare. Our automated management systems and integrated software drive efficiency and profitability, enabling us to grow to 36 stores by the end of 2024. This unique scalability, operational excellence, and proven playbook have put us on a path to build the world’s first billion-dollar tattoo and piercing studio brand!
Industry Groups: Commerce and Shopping, Consumer Goods, Other

Description: Revvis is a classic start-up. Consisting of the three founders Christian, Pierre and Dandy.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Revvis is a classic start-up. Consisting of the three founders Christian, Pierre and Dandy. The development of revvis began without capital and offices, but with many technical and innovative ideas, which are due to our extensive experience in game development and a strong will. After years of design, feedback from friends, architects and construction companies, we succeeded in the successful market launch of revvis in July 2017. The idea After one of our founding members realized the biggest investment of his life - the purchase of a prefabricated house - the first uncertainties arose due to the different interpretation of each family member. The practical layout of the rooms, the actual perceived size and also the brightness in the individual rooms were pure speculation. It was followed by a consideration and the answer that got everything rolling: "Can you already look at the house somewhere as a 3D model? Is there something like that? "No, we found out. With our approach, we wanted to create sustainability and, in particular, fill the gap between the own imagination and a simple floor plan, bringing people together to simplify things. In the meantime, we have been able to develop many different functionalities in revvis, which makes this simulation software a worthwhile companion before, during and after the construction phase.
Industry Groups: Hardware, Software

Industries: Augmented Reality, Automotive, Construction, Data Visualization, Metaverse, Predictive Analytics, Retail, Virtual Reality
Description: Bringing fiction to reality of metaverse within engineering solutions by discovering the law of natural physics within simulated world.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: The concept of digital twin is becoming more apparent in the construction industry. A digital twin is a virtual representation of a physical object or system across its lifecycle, using real-time data to enable understanding, learning, and reasoning. In terms of automated production and level of digitalization, the construction industry is still significantly behind other industries. Nevertheless, the megatrends like Big Data or the Internet of Things offer great opportunities for the future development of the construction sector. Prerequisite for the successful Construction 4.0 is the creation of a digital twin of a construction site. CIM (Construction/Civil Information Modeling) enables architects and planners to come together and work on a set of 3D models. This in return, creates an interactive project which promotes real-time collaboration. When the architects and engineers are collaborating, planning and sharing the information of the project, they are effectively employing CIM. Through the use of CIM, projects of any scale are able to be constructed, this could be something as small as an individual building to a full-fledged town. CIM’s ability to offer improved results at a lower cost is what drives the change from traditional methods in the industry. Along the total life cycle from design to construction, operation and maintenance towards remodeling or demolition, the digital twin follows all modifications of the real construction site and dynamically readjusts itself in case of recorded performance differences. Thus, for the whole lifespan of the real construction site, performance predictions generated with the virtual twin represent an accurate basis for well-informed decisions. DigitalTwin Technology is a construction technology company operating out of Cologne Germany. DigitalTwin Technology is the first company in the world to make use of VR and AR for digital twin in the tunneling segment of the construction industry for CIM (Construction/Civil Information Modeling). Tunnelware is a VaaS (Virtuality as a Service) for tunnel construction industry to manage the construction process while managing the data generated by various sensors and human interaction. With a focus on reducing cost and waste​ and increasing productivity, our system will improve the construction process at every stage, delivering faster builds to a higher quality with fewer defects and more sustainable tunnels.
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Commerce and Shopping, Data and Analytics, Design, Hardware, Information Technology, Media and Entertainment, Real Estate, Software, Transportation
Founders: Holger Sprengel, Jens Piesk, Rahul Tomar

Full Description: expertmatch is the most convenient way to book the best tech freelancers online. We simplify the recruitment of tech freelancers by operating a fully automated marketplace-platform that matches the best freelancers with exciting companies. The goal is to create an attractive solution for both sides: on-demand, relevant development skills for companies, secure and exciting projects for freelancers. expertmatch´s mission is to get every developer a great project. The team believe developers should have all the information they need to choose a project they love: whether that’s based on a cutting-edge tech stack, an inspiring team or just a good hourly rate. The platform matches pre-screened highly qualified developers with top companies through the automated, data-driven marketplace. To be accepted into the network, all expertmatch freelancers must pass a screening process that includes tests for communication skills and a variety of technical exams. By connecting developer directly to project managers, expertmatch offers companies the best way to cost-effectively scale a team with quality freelancer hires.  expertmatch develops machine learning models that track real-time data, monitor trends and predict hiring behavior in order to effectively place candidates with more accuracy, speed and compatibility. expertmatch was founded by Dirk Franzke, Jonathan Klinkhammer and Jonas Holtorf February 26, 2018. Description: Smart therapy system for treating cognitive diseases.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: ichó is the smart therapy system for people with neurological conditions such as dementia, stroke or Parkinson's disease. The therapeutic care of these patients is already a major challenge today. Due to demographic change and a shortage of skilled labour, there is a risk of undersupply. The innovative medical device, the ichó therapy ball, provides patients with a smart device that stimulates and guides them in the implementation of therapeutic measures. The ichó applications give patients access to guideline-compliant therapy programmes, while the smart patient monitoring transparently displays the therapy process with real-world data. While smartphone apps or tablet solutions are already a challenge for patients to use, ichó has been specially developed for people with cognitive and motor impairments. The smart therapy ball recognises all interactions such as rolling, catching or shaking and reacts with coloured light, sound or music depending on the programme. Together with therapists, there are over 150 guideline-compliant therapy applications that stimulate patients' cognitive and motor skills. The effectiveness of ichó is confirmed by medical professionals and evaluations. Since its market launch in 2020, ichó has already been used in over 850 facilities. In mid-2023, based on the evaluations, the ichó therapy programme was funded by the care insurance funds for the first time as a preventive service in accordance with Section 5 SGB XI. The goal of ichó is to provide outpatient care for all patients at home.
Industry Groups: Health Care
Founders: Alkje Stuhlmann, Mario Knappmann, Steffen Preuß
Top 5 Investors: NRW.BANK, Capacura, Meerkat, Silicone Group Holding, Aquarius

Full Description: LiSA is a SaaS start-up on a mission to bring the most joyful, seamless and scalable live shopping experiences to leading e-retailers and marketplaces across the globe. With its turnkey solutions it brings best-in-class live social commerce to life, thus enabling brands and e-retailers to engage with and build their own communities in a fun and highly scalable way. The challenge for e-retailers today is that consumers are increasingly seeking to be entertained and inspired when they shop online. Therefore, e-retailers are looking for quick, effective, and scalable ways to transform their mostly transaction-driven online shopping experience into a social and discovery-led one.   With conversion rates of up to 35% and engagement rates of up tp 90%, LiSA-powered livestream shopping is a highly effective way for e-retailers to enable such experiences for its online audiences.  LiSA’s live social commerce solutions span from API-free plug-and-play ones, across more deeply integrated and customizable ones (also in-app) all the way to a multi-host-capable turnkey white label solution for fully community-led live shopping.

It utilizes formate as its central mediator to bind and store CO2 and H2 (made from water) in liquid form. The company's bioprocesses start with the feedstock formate and it uses synthetic biology to design specific pathways and to convert formate into value-added chemicals. The platform is built on anaerobic and aerobic microbial production hosts to provide flexibility in the process design and adaptation to specific product requirements. B.fab GmbH applies laboratory automation, high-throughput experimentation, and advanced bioprocess development in an agile environment to develop new bioprocesses efficiently and in a minimal time frame. The productivity, but especially the quality, is significantly increased compared to conventional laser welding. The increase in process efficiency reduces the heat input required and thus the distortion. The reduced ambient pressure stabilizes the molten pool and pores and cracks can be avoided, even with alloys that are difficult to weld.

Full Description: We are a software and IT solutions company headquartered in the Netherlands with over a decade of experience, delivering bespoke experience to our customers. It learns from reports, RFIs, FAQs, ERPs, and CRMs to provide requested information to customers, auditors, and internal QA teams through reports or auto-filled online questionnaires about ESG, risk, and compliance up to 8X faster at 20% cost. It also serves as an ESG AI assistant for your suppliers throughout your supply chain, making data sharing less burdensome for them, thus ensuring that your company is the first to receive the requested information compared to your competitors. In addition to that, Our suite of traceability systems helps build trust in sources and plays a marked role in assuring quality across supply chains. We envision a sustainable future and showcasing organic claims/product mapping that eventually builds customer loyalty is our forte. Our modular approach makes it easier for you to scale up when required. We collaborate with Standards, NGO’s and certification bodies assuring quality in the product path/value chain CIED's mission is to enhance the possibilities of innovation and development at a practical cost through Information Technology and globally deliver it to all the economic sectors. Since its incorporation in 2011, CIED has nurtured itself to become a full-grown IT service provider to multinational companies all over the globe. The company has grown from offering Web and mobile applications in the Sustainable agriculture sector, the Auditor Desk project: developing web and mobile applications of Trustea, a sustainable tea certification backed by Unilever, Tata Global Beverages, Indian Tea Board, and other major players in the Indian Tea Sector. Description: Crowd ideation, Crowdsourcing, SaaS, Innovation Management, Innovation Consultancy
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: foxem.net- Great Ideas. Made by the crowd. Be part of the world’s largest brain! Companies are constantly facing challenges. You have suffered a setback, have a vague feeling for a fascinating opportunity or need fresh and new impulses in a certain situation. In today's dynamic world, it would be presumptuous to believe that the management has an answer to everything. Actually it doesn't have to, because there is foxem.net. foxem.net is an online platform on which small, medium and large companies publish their challenges, problems and questions and receive ideas, solutions and best practices from their own employees and thanks to digitization from a worldwide crowd. foxem.net provides ideas on existing products, processes and services, but also focuses in particular on the megatrends that are already gradually and continuously changing our society today. The 12 megatrends are mobility, urbanization, connectivity, neo-ecology, globalization, gender shift, knowledge culture, health, new work, silver society, security and individualization. foxem.net not only raises the gold in employees' minds with a method inspired by Harvard Business School, but also optionally integrates customers and suppliers, expert networks, universities, research institutes, unconventional thinkers and creative minds into the idea-finding process. Basically, everyone is invited to become part of the largest brain in the world - most important is that he or she is open to sharing his or her knowledge, is interested in challenges and wants to make a contribution. For good ideas, crowd members receive rewards, the best idea is rewarded extraordinarily. Through the diversity of crowd members, the functions of the right and left brain complement each other on foxem.net to form a collective mastermind - logic, analysis and reason versus emotion, musicality and intuition, structure, planning and control versus empathy, creativity and lateral thinking. Companies get higher quality, more diversified and more concrete ideas than with all existing systems and that in a highly efficient and cost-effective way. ProBono campaigns are a special type of challenge that deal with issues that do not concern a particular company but society as a whole. Special features of foxem.net are the very easy implementation and usability, the integration of gamification and artificial intelligence and a high degree of automation. However, the unique selling point is and remains natural intelligence - the diversity and individuality of all people who are part of the world's largest brain. Further information is available at www.foxem.net.
Industry Groups: Information Technology, Internet Services, Professional Services

Industries: Bitcoin, Courier Service, Logistics, Smart Contracts, Supply Chain Management, Transportation
Description: Anonybox is a decentralized and crowdsourced Online Logistics Platform based on the IOTA Tangle Network and it’s upcoming Smart Contracts.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Anonybox is a decentralized and crowdsourced online platform on the IOTA Tangle-Network, that allows users to  •	send packages  •	receive packages, and   •	act as a courier by delivering packages all while guaranteeing a same day delivery. Anonybox reaches this goal by constructing Smart Routes for the couriers by taking workload, location and future planned routes of the couriers into account. This is accomplished by our implementation of the Python-For-AI. Anonybox promises a hassle-free delivery by integrating self-fulfilling virtual contractual clauses to act as an insurance for all participating parties. What problem ? From the beginning of big logistics there has always been one big problem. The Last Mile. As big logistics enterprises don't have the capacity or skillset to act quickly and agile and tackle that problem, we, Anonybox, a Blockchain based, decentralized and crowdsourced logistics platform, try to solve this problem once and for all. Our system relies on self-executing Smart Contracts to provide the needed insurance, with parcels being stolen from many of the low paid couriers worldwide, and promises a guaranteed same day delivery inner-city. Our goal is to tackle the Last Mile in a decentralized and secure way using a Peer-to-Peertrust-less approach similar to Uber. By merging many upcoming technologies such as the Smart Contracts, the IoT sensors of many mobile devices (Bluetooth, GPS, Internet connectivity, QR-Code processing) and Artificial Intelligence for our Smart Routes and by being a crowdsourced platform, we can offer a complete one-stop solution regarding the problem of the Last Mile in modern logistics.
Industry Groups: Administrative Services, Blockchain and Cryptocurrency, Financial Services, Payments, Software, Transportation
Founders: Benjamin Reichardt, Cenk Kuscu, Kadir Bacak

Description: Healthcare should be in the hands of people!
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Dentacoin Foundation is the organization that has developed the first Blockchain solution for the global dental industry. It was founded in March 2017 in Maastricht, Netherlands. Through its cryptocurrency (DCN) and a set of incentivized software tools, the Foundation has managed to create a new dental ecosystem which favours all industry stakeholders: patients, dentists, manufacturers, suppliers, labs, insurance companies. The core purpose of the Foundation is to improve long-term health, reduce costs and pain, and continuously support the growth in the value of DCN. Dentacoin owes its existence to the joint efforts of a group of like-minded dentistry and digital transformation experts eager to reshape the dental industry by adopting integrated, Blockchain-based technologies. The Foundation is backed by a vast community of progressive dentists committed to moving the focus from acute treatment to sustainable prevention in the interest of all people. Dentacoin is the one and only cryptocurrency in the world that connects all participants in the global dental industry. In contrast to the inflation-prone world currencies, it holds the potential to make people richer rather than poorer. In its essence, Dеntacoin has a strong social aspect - it empowers people to receive affordable and sustainable dental care and to earn additional income for their active usage of Dentacoin Apps. The Blockchain-based software tools developed by the Dentacoin Foundation are a means of distributing DCN cryptocurrency to the key end users (i.e. patients, dentists, manufacturers). In return for writing reviews about their dentist (Trusted Reviews Platform), taking dental surveys (DentaVox), and maintaining excellent oral hygiene (Dentacare Mobile dApp), they receive different amounts of DCN. Thus, people within Dentacoin Ecosystem are encouraged to contribute to the improvement of dental care both on a personal and global level. The next milestone on Dentacoin’s roadmap is the development of another two Blockchain-based applications - a revolutionary insurance-like model called Dentacoin Assurance, with its testnet already released and a secure, patient-managed Health Database.
Industry Groups: Blockchain and Cryptocurrency, Health Care, Other
Founders: Dimitar Dimitrakiev, Jeremias Grenzebach, Philipp Grenzebach

Description: Shared mobility connecting everyone. We enable the future of mobility based on blockchain solutions. (SaaS)
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Shared Mobility Connecting Everyone! We enable the future of mobility based on blockchain solutions. Our Vision Together with our partners we are developing a blockchain platform to support an open and secure infrastructure for mobility business. Our goal is to build a strong B2B-network based on green and shared electricity and digital technology. We are exited about sustainable mobility and strongly believe in its future. Our first product: Share&Charge Share&Charge is a network for all types of charging stations. On the one hand, we want to encourage and help emobilists to connect regionally and support each other and on the other hand we want to bring relevant companies and organizations to the same table in order to speed up the expansion of the charging infrastructure in Germany quickly and reliably. For this we are developing the Share&Charge App, which makes the sharing of the charging stations as well as billing for the energy transaction possible. More information: www.shareandcharge.com More Products: Seamless EV-Charging "from Oslo to Rome" Connecting public (and private) charging infrastructure across Europe on a ‘Decentral Mobility Network’ to enable direct, cross-country charging as the basis for future mobility. More information: www.oslo2rome.com Seamless EV-Charging in California together with eMotorWerks Enabling charging station owners in America to share their charging station via a P2P charging station network based on blockchain technology. More information:  https://emotorwerks.com/share-and-charge Peer-to-Peer Car Sharing (Pilot) With Blockchain technology enabling the access to the car and the payment and therewith supporting the exciting idea of P2P car sharing. Mobility as a Service (Pilot) Enabling a seamless mobility throughout Germany with different means of transport and simple and convinient blockchain-based payment.
Industry Groups: Blockchain and Cryptocurrency, Consumer Electronics, Hardware, Other, Software, Sustainability

Description: Freightly is a real-time logistics & transport management system.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Freightly TMS (transport management system) combines IT with expertise in the logistics sector and will digitalize your company – depending on your requirements, easily and accessible from anywhere. At Freightly TMS, we have the vision of making logistics digital in order to enable access at any time. With the aid of our smart data analysis techniques, it is possible to make qualified decisions more quickly. The management of logistics services is fundamentally simplified, and complex tasks are optimized. Information and document exchange with your forwarding agents, shipping lines and airlines is a key element of Freightly TMS. Freightly TMS covers all your logistics processes, from procurement and shipping to billing, to form a cloud-based solution aimed at reducing volatility within the supply chain and open up the opportunity to enter the age of digitalization. Every decision in the shipping process, from booking and documentation to payment, is supported by our intelligent database processes. Recurring work steps are automated, saving you enormous amounts of time. Freightly TMS also offers the possibility of live tracking your shipments and real-time checking for changes in freight prices or previously negotiated rates. Use our statistics and analysis tools to recognize trends in the market and react to them. We are a new form of logistics – from the bottom up for quick and qualified decisions for all those involved in the supply chain. Check out our Freightly advantages & modules: + digital freight purchase + white-label-solution + reports / statistics + real-time tracking / diver app + route management / disposition + parcel shipping + article PO management + airline management + carrier matching + warehouse management  + work planning + ocean carrier management + SAP / ERP interface + freight rates upload + customer login + manage multiple locations + supplier login

PostDICOM is an advanced software for all users who want secure data archiving and access in the healthcare field, especially healthcare professionals. With this software, both individuals and corporate users will be able to convert any medical image into DICOM (Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine) format and store it in the cloud environment. Data is stored in the cloud and provided with high-level data security. It is easily accessible from any HTML5 compliant devices (desktop PCs, tablets and smartphones). Owing to these qualities, it can be used as an individual archive for many years as well as being used as a PACS (Picture Archiving and Communication System) and TeleHealth solution for a hospital chain. If you want to use it as a PACS solution, you will be able to access the data very quickly thanks to advanced image processing tools and data streaming algorithms. Under all conditions, our highest priority is that the end user gets the best service. The system is available with 50 GB of free space. This space is free and expandable. If you need more space, request for an additional data and we will provide you storage space with a fee. The software is mainly used for image archiving, processing and grouping, and in the future it will be used for sharing and training purposes. With these features, it goes beyond just being an archive and ensures that all users behave like an independent enterprise on the system. Healthcare professions will be able to exchange ideas with their colleagues on their own fields, offer their patients a second opinion and safely archive data from patients if necessary. Our company is well aware of the importance and confidentiality of healthcare data. We will take highest level of safety precautions and will not allow even the smallest system vulnerability. It is our greatest desire that our users use this service with great pleasure and enthusiasm. For this purpose, we express that we are open to any suggestions, opinions and requests that you may send us. Our only expectation from our users is that you can not allow the system to be used outside the intended purpose. It is important to notify us about any sharing and approach that will harm this structure. Since the sharing environment of the software will provide the safest transfer of any kind of medical information, it will also eliminate problems related to personality rights and patient privacy. Because the patient information can be anonymized and shared, patient identity will not be known except for the archiving user. Since there are no restrictions or technological limitations associated with accessing the system from mobile devices, it is possible to transfer and display data from any mobile device. Patient and doctor communications will be easy in the case of emergency.
Industry Groups: Health Care, Information Technology, Software

Description: DepotCity digitalizes the warehousing and fulfillment sector. Simply book your warehouse or fulfillment online - we do the rest!
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: DepotCity was founded in 2017 in Cologne, Germany. The company provides a platform for warehouse and fulfillment solutions. DepotCity digitalizes the entire process from booking storage solutions, the operational management as well as the reporting on inventories. This service is achieved through integrations into major merchant-, shop and warehouse management systems. This modern-day service is relevant for vendors, producers and logistic companies: all the mentioned groups seek storage solutions to seamlessly run their respective operations. Before DepotCity the search for suitable warehouse space and fulfillment services was a timely, in transparent and manual task: desk research, phone calls and emails used to be the tools to purchase storage space. In addition, in-depth logistical knowledge was advantageous to compare and rate different service offerings. Additionally, minimum trading units and inflexible contract durations made short term usage of storage solutions nearly impossible.  DepotCity is an easy and comfortable solution to this problem. Through its website www.depotcity.de, after filling out basic information about the required service, an offer is made and can be booked instantly. Using these developed tools, booking of storage space becomes as easy as booking a flight / hotel. Using scaling effects DepotCity can offer competitive prices. In addition, the company does not require fixed contract length or minimum trading units.

Description: SaaS, B2B, AI, Platform, ProcureTech, Procurement, Professional Services, Market Intelligence, Project Performance Monitoring
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: apadua provides an AI-powered SaaS solution for services procurement. Its five core modules boost productivity and collaboration between buyers and internal customers in the services category: 1. BRIEF enables users to leverage AI to create tender-ready project descriptions in minutes collaboratively. 2. EXPLORE is a comprehensive AI-curated online vendor directory. Here, preferred partners, approved suppliers, and new providers can be found and selected based on their project fit. 3. SOURCE is tailored to the procurement of services, complementing conventional S2C solutions. Buyers and their internal customers are guided through the competitive tendering process. 4. MONITOR is a survey-based project quality and performance tracking system. By continuously collecting feedback from all stakeholders, risks are identified before they become actual problems. 5. APALYTICS consolidates all data ever exchanged via the apadua platform in one place. This enables a wide range of analyses, such as benchmarks, cost structures, target prices and team compositions. The ProcureTech scaleup from Cologne, Germany is a trusted partner of global enterprise clients including ABB, AXA, Covestro, dormaka, and GEA.
Industry Groups: Administrative Services, Information Technology, Internet Services, Other, Professional Services, Software
Top 5 Investors: Martina Pfeifer, Manuel Mueller, Michala Rudorfer, Christian Portz, Holger Felgner

Full Description: Aerosint invented a unique selective powder recoating technology.    The Aerosint patterning drums selectively deposit fine powder voxels line by line. Industries: Collaboration, Enterprise, Information Technology, Meeting Software, Productivity Tools, SaaS, Scheduling, Software
Description: Scedule is a SaaS platform that directs and governs scheduling processes for the benefit of a company’s business and productivity.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Everyone is talking about collaboration, nobody about how it is organised. However, the way you plan collaboration is decisive for its productivity. Scedule is not the next scheduling tool. It's a SaaS platform that directs and governs scheduling processes for the benefit of a company’s business and productivity. Companies have numerous tools to manage data and processes. But they don't have any tool to manage and prioritise the organisation's time. When which group of participants works together on which topic is controlled exclusively by structural specifications. We are convinced that in a knowledge-driven economy, the use of time to create value must be digitised and automated. Therefor Scedule goes beyond the known scope of scheduling tools: A smart algorithm identifies meaningful date proposals that take into account specific business preferences. Resource bookings in linked groupware are made automatically and in advance according to the schedule. The Scedule API enables the integration of ready-to-use applications into company-specific collaboration tools. And meeting-related workflows are automated based on company specific rules and in terms of productivity.
Industry Groups: Information Technology, Messaging and Telecommunications, Other, Software

Description: Officefirst Immobilien is a office-focused German real estate business.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: With a portfolio of about 100 properties, a total real estate value of approximately 3.2 billion Euro and lettable space of more than 1.4 million square meters we focus on selected Metropolitan Areas in Germany with a dedicated attention on the top six regions Berlin, Dusseldorf, Frankfurt, Hamburg, Munich and Stuttgart. Here,  more than 95% of our lettable areas are located. Due to a balanced tenant base, long contractual terms, a high occupancy rate and the extensive know-how of the entire team, the company combines stability with the potential for a sustainable increase in value. Our operation‘s primary objective is to own and let as well as to manage our properties in a value-improving manner. Doing so, we strive for an enduring enhancement of our lettable space as well as our asset management services. Our goal is to achieve high quality standards in all real estate related activities as well as in the fair and cooperative relationship to our tenants. The deep knowledge of the German real estate market resulting from many years of experience and the evolved internal structures are the company’s key success factors. OFFICEFIRST Immobilien runs five local offices in the important metropolitan regions Frankfurt, Munich, Hamburg, Dusseldorf and Berlin and features distinctively assigned regional asset managers as contacts for all matters regarding rental space or individual objects. In addition, we intend to gain sustainable value for our total portfolio by systematical investments, market-oriented development of own properties and targeted acquisitions. Here as well we rely on in-house resources in terms of Development and Investment.
Industry Groups: Real Estate
Transaction Name: Officefirst Immobilien acquired by Blackstone Group

Industries: Assisted Living, Elder Care, Hardware, Health Care, Home Health Care, Internet of Things, Nursing and Residential Care, Software
Description: Innovative solutions for fall prevention and fall detection in nursing care facilities
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: We believe that good care is not a privilege. That is why we have developed intelligent solutions under the nevisCura brand that significantly improve the living and working situation of people in the care sector. Our technical assistance systems have been specially developed for care facilities to offer them a cost-effective and efficient solution for more relief and security. In doing so, we have never lost sight of the customer focus and have incorporated the feedback from numerous pilot projects with long-standing customers into the further development. Only in this way could we be sure that our solutions supported caregivers in their everyday work and relieved them in the long term. And that for many years: because the solutions are designed to be future-proof so that you benefit from regular updates and the highest level of investment protection. Our solution consists of the nevisCura bed and room sensor. The bed sensor from nevisCura is an intelligent bed exit alarm that noticeably facilitates the daily work of caregivers. Once attached to the bed in just a few steps, the silent guard discreetly signals when a resident wants to get out of bed - even before he or she has set foot on the floor. And best of all: the sensor is compatible with every common call system. The room sensor from nevisCura is an innovative sensor system that is used for fall detection and prevention in outpatient and inpatient care facilities. Once installed all around at the height of the base boards, it offers the greatest protection for residents and noticeably relieves caregivers.
Industry Groups: Hardware, Health Care, Internet Services, Software
Founders: Christian Kind, David Link, Dennis Breuer, Stelios Katsanevakis
Top 5 Investors: EIT Health, Schürfeld Group, European Data Incubator

Description: talpasolutions offers a predictive analytics SaaS platform that delivers unparalleled added value for the heavy industries.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: talpasolutions a predictive SaaS analytics provider for the mining industry that helps companies optimize machine performance, reduce breakdowns, and improve safety by making data more understandable. talpasolutions makes it possible for operators and machine manufacturers in heavy industry to use machine data that would have otherwise been lost. talpasolutions concentrates on building visualization and analysis applications for the industrial internet. In the first step, large amounts of data from the machines are recorded. Comprehendable visualizations allow for different stakeholders to understand relationships based on sensor data and contextual data and to react to critical information, which would otherwise have been buried in the data transfer. In the second step the newest predictive models are applied to eliminate events such as errors and the breakdown of machines critical to the process. This increases not only the availability but also the workload of the machines. talpasolutions has built a network out of industry partners to develop solutions that stretch across various sectors and unify industry experience, data science, and workflow connectivity. Using predictive instructions our platform recognizes problems before they occur and supports users with workflow-based processes. Our applications make it possible to collect performance data from machines in order to recommend optimal fleet combinations for respective scenarios to customers. This leads to more operating hours, higher efficiency, and an improved lifetime value of the machines.
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Information Technology, Science and Engineering, Software

Description: Act&Sorb is a self-sustaining recycling services designed to produce valuable resources from non-recyclable wastes.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Act&Sorb is a self-sustaining recycling services designed to produce valuable resources from non-recyclable wastes. It is the first company to have developed a sustainable and value-adding process for re-cycling MDF. Using a pyrolysis technology, MDF waste is converted into high value activated carbon that helps provide our planet with clean air, clean water and clean soil. Act&Sorb’s mission is to develop the greenest commercial recycling solutions for hard to recycle or non-recyclable waste streams such as MDF. As pollutants in our water, air and soil are impacting the planet, we’ve created a process that converts MDF into a high value material that helps make our world cleaner. A process that turns one industry’s waste into the other’s raw material. Act&Sorb was established in 2016 and is based in Houthalen-Helchteren, Belgium.

Headquartered in Maastricht, Netherlands, the company’s core business is the development, manufacturing and marketing of synthetic high-performance rubber for use in the automotive and tire industries, the construction industry, and the oil and gas industries.  ARLANXEO was established in April 2016 as a joint venture of LANXESS - a world-leading specialty chemicals company based in Cologne, Germany - and Saudi Aramco - a major global energy and chemicals enterprise headquartered in Dhahran, Saudi Arabia. The two partners each hold a 50-percent interest in the joint venture. Full Description: Ario strives for more safety behind the steering wheel with a monitoring system that detects sleep and unattentive driving. 34,4% of all road incidents are caused by drowsiness. It's Ario's mission to reduce that number to zero. The Ario system helps truckers and bus drivers stay safe by measuring micro-adjustments that are necessary to keep the vehicle driving straight. Whenever the system notices a change in pattern or a lack of movement, it alerts the driver and suggests to take a rest. After years of working on the system in their spare time, founders Thomas Dietvorst and Jelle Van Winckel now take their product to the market. The system already is available at Van Hool and Volvo, which results in about a hundred active Ario systems in busses and lorries today.

Description: Innogy is an energy company that generates energy from renewable sources and ensures that the electricity arrives at home.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Innogy is an energy company that generates energy from renewable sources and ensures that the electricity arrives at home. With its three business areas of Renewables, Grid & Infrastructure as well as Retail, it addresses the requirements of a modern, decarbonised, decentralised and digital energy world. The focus of Innogy SE’s activities is on offering existing and potential customers innovative and sustainable products and services that enable them to use energy more efficiently and improve their quality of life.  In renewable power generation, the company is also active in other regions, e.g. Spain and Italy. The new subsidiary of RWE AG started operations on 1 April 2016. On 29 June 2016, the name of the European stock company was announced: Innogy. The new name took formal effect as of September 2016, since the company, as well as its products and services, will be gradually rebranded. Based on the combined financial statements for 2015, the company would have a revenue of around €46 billion and an EBITDA of €4.5 billion. The company is expected to employ around 40,000 out of a total of around 60,000 employees of the RWE Group once the restructuring process has been completed. They plan, build, and operate plants to generate power and extract energy from renewable sources. They aim to rapidly expand renewables in Europe, both on their own and with partners. In this way, they can work together to make the energy transition a success. The distribution grids form the backbone of the energy transition. They play a key role in securing power supply by integrating weather- and time-dependent renewable sources as well as decentralized generating systems. They have currently distribution grids in five countries, four-fifths of it comprising power lines and one-fifth gas lines. They currently supply around 16 million electricity customers and seven million gas customers in eleven European markets with energy, both reliably and at fair prices. Based on volumes sold respectively the number of customers, they are currently among the largest electricity and gas retailers in Germany, the Netherlands, and in the United Kingdom. Furthermore, they currently hold leading positions in electricity and/or gas supply in many markets in Central Eastern and South=Eastern Europe.
Industry Groups: Commerce and Shopping, Energy, Natural Resources

Full Description: Hello, We are Wuunder! The most innovative transportmanagement software for all shipments worldwide We help our customers save time, money and unnecessary frustrations by fully automating their shipping process. We book documents, packages, pallets and (sea) containers with more than 300 carriers to choose from. With Wuunder's smart shipping software, customer can choose their favorite carriers, optimize their warehouse process and ship worldwide to wherever they want. After shipment, we take care of everything for our clients so they don't have to worry about it: we track their shipment and check the invoices. We'll even take care of their customer service! It's very easy to start shipping via Wuunder. All you need to get started is to make a MyWunnder account and link Wuunder to your system using one of our many webshop integrations, StorySyncs or API. Our software can be easily connected to the most popular systems worldwide like WooCommerce, Shopify and Magento. You’re probably wuundering why we spell our name with two u’s. It’s because we passionately believe that personal service is essential in the digital world. While others deliver from place to place, we think in terms of delivering from person to person. Or in our language, from U to U, from YOU to YOU. This is all part of our quest to be easy, efficient, connected. We Are Wuunder.

Description: AI for neurodegenerative diseases like Alzheimer’s disease, Parkinson and TBI
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: AI for neurodegenerative diseases. Diagnosis of Alzheimer’s disease takes about 2,5-3 years to make a diagnosis. At that moment if the first neurological symptoms appears it is already too late too many brain cells are already death. There is no cure but if we can make a diagnose 5-10 years before symptoms appears there is a possibility to prevent and to treat the disease. The problem is that we can make brain scan only in a hospital and there is no possibility to track the patient. With digital biomarkers we can track the patient POC (point-of-care) on a non-invasive way and cheap.
